long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TimeStation Work Hours Calculator

TimeStation Work Hours Calculator is a handy Chrome extension designed to help users keep track of their work hours directly from the MyTimeStation Activity page. It’s an essential tool for anyone looking to simplify their daily and monthly time management without the hassle of manual calculations.

Why You Should Install It:

	•	Real-time Work Hours: Automatically calculates your total work hours for today, so you always know how much you’ve worked at a glance.
	•	Monthly Tracking: Keep track of your total work hours for the current month, making it easy to meet your goals or manage your overtime.
	•	Time Management Insight: Displays remaining hours needed to meet your daily/monthly requirements or the overtime you’ve worked, helping you optimize your schedule.

How It Works:

	1.	Install and Set Up: Simply add the extension to Chrome, navigate to the MyTimeStation Activity page, and click on the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar.
	2.	Instant Access to Data: View your calculated work hours directly in the popup, without any additional setup or manual input.

Perfect for remote workers, freelancers, and anyone using MyTimeStation to log their work hours, this extension offers a streamlined, efficient way to stay on top of your time management.
